About -

We are a multi-disciplinary interior design practice providing clients with a high end, bespoke finish, to any taste and ambition. We work across a range of projects from large scale commercial installations to private residential projects, with equal focus on functionality and aesthetic.

Follow -

SGW Global

Sector:

Commercial

We helped create:

Architecture, Interior, Art Direction, Furniture, Lighting

Global communications companies are usually located in anonymous and bland facilities. SGW have a London base that is more cool studio than mundane office.

A concise 10 week programme saw an empty canal side industrial shell transformed into a cool, contemporary, efficient workplace. The informal calm belies the fact that Branch Place is a powerfully connected technological hub. This duality is something we pursue in our work.

A concise programme and stringent budget necessitated Jackdaw Studios implementing a Design and Build contract. This enabled very precise responsive project management. An important factor in achieving a confident, beautifully executed result.
